name: Yu Lan
description:
The martial arts star of Domain 9. All opponents who have fought her admired her, and she was consequently appointed by Master Yu as a Sundial Guard at Ignisville Sundial Square. Her dedication to martial arts far exceeds that of ordinary people, and she can be relied on for a sure victory on the battlefield. She believes that within seven paces, the fist is the fastest.

Although she looks gentle, she is actually rather serious. Her opponents in the Martial Arts Tournament understand this deeply from experience. At the beginning of the Martial Arts Tournament, she did not even understand the etiquette and rules of the competition. Her moves were extremely fierce and powerful, defeating everyone quickly and efficiently. It was not until later that Yu Lan realized how rude her previous behavior was, and she specifically went to find her opponents to apologize. All those opponents who claimed to be from a "certain clan" just wanted to put on a show before the competition and say a few words to increase their popularity, hoping that their opponents will give some face and show mercy. Unfortunately, Yu Lan did not recognize their true intentions. Instead, she took each of them seriously, beating all of them to the ground, each one faster than the other. This kind of practice is naturally detested by those in the circle. However, due to Yu Lan's mistake, the Martial Arts Tournament, which rarely drew anyone in, ended up attracting more people's attention. Everyone benefited, and it can be regarded as a blessing in disguise.

She is honest and enthusiastic, and is even willing to impart everything she knows to opponents who come asking for advice. However, in reality, her understanding of martial arts is not very good. To be precise, she is not good at teaching others about the essence of martial arts. People are often curious about Yu Lan's martial arts lineage. She herself does not shy away from it, because the martial arts style she practices is the common fitness boxing in Domain 9 that many people practice to keep fit. But people don't truly believe her, because everyone practices it as a kind of "radio calisthenics," but she performs the same moves with such amazing power, so it is generally believed that Yu Lan has acquired some secret talent to become so powerful. This often leads people to ask her about martial arts, but since she is not good at explaining the essentials of those martial arts techniques, it usually makes her feel very anxious.

Yu Lan will quickly enter a state of selflessness when practicing martial arts and fighting, allowing her to focus on her practice without distraction. The effect is outstanding. Regarding this, Master Yu believes that Yu Lan has what the philosophers of ancient times called the "pure heart of a child," and can thus obtain twice the results with half the effort. Practicing martial arts is the most suitable path for her. On the contrary, in daily life, because she is too sincere, she sometimes doesn't take other people's thoughts into consideration, so she comes off as rather reckless. However, all this is being gradually corrected under the guidance of Master Yu. As every suggestion made by Master Yu has an immediate effect on Yu Lan, she is also willing to listen to Master Yu's guidance.
like: Practicing martial arts, eating, and competing in tournaments
dislike: Thoughtful planning, explaining the theory of martial arts.

skills.name: Battering Fist
skills.description: While on the ground, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 64.8% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 50.4% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 52.8% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 143.9% of ATK plus 8 and knock the target back. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 279.2% of ATK plus 15 and continuously knock the target back. Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to 227.4% of ATK plus 12 and launch the target. Battering Fist can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form. After using any dodge attack while in the Martial Artist form, use normal attack to quickly trigger the Fourth Attack. After the Fifth Attack lands a hit while in the Martial Artist form, strongly freeze the target for 2 seconds (unavailable in Apex League and against bosses) and additionally inflict Chilblain, dealing damage equal to 280% of ATK plus 15 every second for 8 seconds. This effect can only be triggered on the same target 1 time every 8 seconds.

skills.name: Floating Fist
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to launch 6 consecutive attacks in mid-air, consuming endurance. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 68.4% of ATK plus 4. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 59.9% of ATK plus 3. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 62.7% of ATK plus 3. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 136.4% of ATK plus 7. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 249% of ATK plus 13. Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to 222.3% of ATK plus 12. Floating Fist can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Forest-Piercing Swallow
skills.description: Forest-Piercing Swallow can only be used while in the Martial Artist form. While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to third normal attacks to trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow. Deal damage equal to 62.8% of ATK plus 3 and draw in nearby targets. Then, deal damage equal to 146.8% of ATK plus {3} and knock the targets back. After using Cloud-Soaring Kite, using normal attack can also trigger Forest-Piercing Swallow.

skills.name: Sky-Dancing Snake
skills.description: Sky-Dancing Snake can only be used while in the Martial Artist form. While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack when using the fourth to fifth normal attacks to trigger Sky-Dancing Snake. Deal damage equal to 153.9% of ATK plus 8 to nearby targets and suspend them. After using Forest-Piercing Swallow, tapping and holding normal attack can also trigger Sky-Dancing Snake.

skills.name: Frost High & Low
skills.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack when using the first to sixth normal attacks to trigger Frost High & Low. Toss your weapon in the air, dealing damage equal to 329% of ATK plus 17 to nearby targets. Frost High & Low can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Cloud-Soaring Kite
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Cloud-Soaring Kite. Fall from above, dealing damage equal to 148.6% of ATK plus 8 to nearby targets upon reaching the ground and knock them down. Cloud-Soaring Kite can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Total Rewind
skills.description: When on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Total Rewind. Continuously draw in nearby targets while consuming endurance, during which the Wanderer gains hyperbody. Total Rewind can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of targets within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging. Can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form. After dodging while in the Martial Artist form, gain hyperbody for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Impossible Feat
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Impossible Feat, dealing damage equal to 177.6% of ATK plus 9 to nearby targets. Impossible Feat can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Sweeping Clouds
skills.description: Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Sweeping Clouds, dealing damage equal to 167.6% of ATK plus 9 to nearby targets. Sweeping Clouds can be used in either the Martial Artist or Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Offense & Defense
skills.description: Unity has 2 forms: Martial Artist and Sweeping Force. Activate up to 1 of them via the Skills - Settings page. They cannot be switched while in the combat state. Martial Artist form: While in the combat state, Unity's dodge attack/normal attack multiplier is additionally increased by 40%. After using any weapon's dodge attack or normal attack 3 times, receive 1 Internal Strength (up to 10). Only 1 Internal Strength can be obtained every 2 seconds. While not in the combat state, all Internal Strength will be cleared. Sweeping Force form: After Observe & React lands a hit, enter the Anticipate state and receive 1 Fighting Spirit every 0.8 seconds (up to 15) for 60 seconds. While not in the combat state, all Fighting Spirit will be cleared. Passive: Chill When Unity is equipped, ignore 30% of targets' Frost Resistance. This effect also works in the off-hand slot.

skills.name: Fire in the Hole
skills.description: Deal damage equal to 982.8% of ATK plus 52 to the target. Cooldown: 15 seconds. When using Fire in the Hole, Unity will consume up to 5 Internal Strength. When it consumes 1/2/3/4/5 Internal Strength, Fire in the Hole will deal 1.2/1.5/2.1/2.8/3.7 times of its original damage respectively. After using Fire in the Hole, increase frost damage by 20% for 30 seconds. After using Fire in the Hole, restore 2 dodge attempts. Fire in the Hole can only be used while in the Martial Artist form. When Internal Strength reaches 5, reset Fire in the Hole's cooldown.

skills.name: Clashing of Arms
skills.description: Deal damage equal to 982.8% of ATK plus 52 to the target. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While in the Anticipate state, when using any weapon skill, Unity will consume up to 5 Fighting Spirit. When it consumes 1/2/3/4/5 Fighting Spirit, deal additional area damage equal to 242%/503%/1,049%/2,351%/3,930% of ATK, and deal damage equal to 260% of ATK plus 14 every second for 5 seconds. After using any frost weapon skill, gain 2 seconds of hyperbody. Clashing of Arms can only be used while in the Sweeping Force form.

skills.name: Snow-Treading Tiger
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer, dealing damage up to 1173.1% of ATK plus 62 to nearby targets and strongly launching them. During this period, gain damage immunity for 2.6 seconds (unavailable in Apex League). Snow-Treading Tiger can only be used while in the Martial Artist form.

skills.name: Observe & React
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to 1173.1% of ATK plus 62 to nearby targets and strongly launching them. During this period, gain damage immunity for 2.6 seconds (unavailable in Apex League). After Observe & React lands a hit, increase frost damage by 20% for 30 seconds. After Observe & React lands a hit, enter the Anticipate state for 60 seconds. After using Unity to use a discharge skill, receive 1,000 weapon charge. This effect can only be triggered 1 time every 10 seconds. Observe & React can only be used while in the Sweeping Force form.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to 144% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

weapon_resonance.name: Frost Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Frost Resonance: Increase frost ATK by 20% and frost resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

advancement: While in the Martial Artist form, after consuming 3 or more Internal Strength, Unity restores 3 Internal Strength. Subsequently, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by 5%, and Unity's dodge attack/normal attack damage is increased by 50% for 30 seconds. While in the Sweeping Force form, after consuming 3 or more Fighting Spirit, Unity restores 3 Fighting Spirit. Subsequently, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by 5% for 15 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.

In the Martial Artist form, if Internal Strength is not obtained within 4 seconds, the next acquisition of Internal Strength will grant 2 counts. In any form, when Unity consumes 3 or more Internal Strength or Fighting Spirit, restores 10% of the Wanderer's Max HP. In solo play, the HP recovery is increased to 20%. This effect can only trigger 1 time every 8 seconds in Sweeping Force form. In Martial Artist form, there are no limitations.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.

After Unity consumes Internal Strength or Fighting Spirit, when receiving lethal damage, prevent lethal damage 1 time and recover 10% of the Wanderer's Max HP (Unavailable in Apex League). In solo play, the HP recovery is increased to 20%. Both effects can only trigger 1 time every 8 seconds.

While in the Martial Artist form, Unity's dodge attack / normal attack damage is further increased by 70%. After consuming Internal Strength, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by 10% for 30 seconds. While in the Sweeping Force form, after Unity consumes Fighting Spirit, the Wanderer's final damage is increased by 15% for 30 seconds.

traits.description: Increase final damage by {0}%. While in the Martial Artist form, additionally increase final damage by {1}%. After Fire in the Hole lands a hit, increase frost damage taken by hit targets by {2}% for 20 seconds. While in the Sweeping Force form, for every 1 frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by {3}%. When 3 frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by {4}%.

Increase final damage by {0}%. While in the Martial Artist form, additionally increase final damage by {1}%. After Fire in the Hole lands a hit, increase frost damage taken by hit targets by {2}% for 20 seconds. While in the Sweeping Force form, for every 1 frost weapon equipped, increase damage dealt via consuming Fighting Spirit by {3}%. When 3 frost weapons are equipped, increase frost damage by {4}%.
